sections.heading: lands; control of noxious weeds; contract authorized
sections.text: The Board of Educational Lands and Funds shall have the power to contract with supervisors of weed eradication districts of this state or any private or commercial weed control service for the purpose of controlling noxious weeds on school lands.S

72-240.09.School lands; control of noxious weeds; contract authorized.

The Board of Educational Lands and Funds shall have the power to contract with supervisors of weed eradication districts of this state or any private or commercial weed control service for the purpose of controlling noxious weeds on school lands.

SourceLaws 1965, c. 427, ยง 1, p. 1366;Laws 1978, LB 460, ยง 3.
